===Etymology===
The original meaning may be "meet, interact" or "carefree". Old Chinese: *''greːs groːs'' (possibly an expressive reduplication).

Schuessler considers this a derivative of {{zh-l|*解|to loosen}} and {{zh-l|*懈|lazy, remiss}}, citing the sense of "carefree and happy" in ''Shijing''. Numerous variant forms are found throughout history.
